title: Ticket #4752: Document Shared Port changes
description: In the process of working toward enabling shared port by default, we have introduced several changes to the code base that needs documentation. This ticket will track updating the documentation of the intermediate changes.
remarks:

I think I did what I said I was going to. (Lost the original version of this commit due to a typo and subsequent git foul-up.) Do we need a version history item as well as the gotcha? If so, maybe move the current gotcha entry into the version history and replace the gotcha with something simpler, like

'The condor_shared_port daemon now uses port 9618 by default. To restore condor_shared_port's previous behaviour, set SHARED_PORT_PORT to 0.'

leaving aside the explanation of the previous behaviour.
